text: He imana vali'o! Tuhade vicakara vasi'ata de samem gavahi, jadom ki tuhade vicom' kise di mauta da vakata a jave tam isa tar'ham hai ki do bharose yoga bade tuhade vicom gavaha hona. Jam jekara tusi' yatara vica hovo tam ute mauta vi halata sahamane a jave tam tuhade hora lokam vicom do gavaha lai la'e jana. Phira jekara tuhanu saka ho jave tam covem gavaham nu namaza tom ba'ada roka lavo ate uha dovem alaha di sahu kha ke kahina asim kise kimata upara isa nu nahim vecange bhavem ko'i risatedara ki'um na hove. Ate na hi asim alaha di gavahi nu lukavange. Jekara asim ajiha kari'e tam papi hovange
